div.title: Humanities Academy Teachers Dive Deep into Design Thinking at Stanford

img.alt: Humanities Academy Teachers Dive Deep into Design Thinking at Stanford

div.a: Humanities Academy Teachers Dive Deep into Design Thinking at Stanford

p.em: Teachers John Madden and Matt Daly attended an intensive workshop at Stanford University's prestigious d.school as part of their summer professional development, bringing back with them new insights and experiences to share with students and colleagues.

article.a: Continue Reading about Humanities Academy Teachers Dive Deep into Design Thinking at Stanford

div.title: Mackey Pendergrast at the National Press Club

img.alt: Mackey Pendergrast at the National Press Club

div.a: MSD in D.C.! Superintendent Pendergrast Shares District's Success at the National Press Club

div.p: Superintendent Mackey Pendergrast presented at the National Press Club on October 16 as part of a national showcase on Equity and Excellence.

article.a: Continue Reading about MSD in D.C.! Superintendent Pendergrast Shares District's Success at the National Press Club

div.a: K-5 Conferences; 4-hr day for elementary students
K-5 Conferences; 4-hr day for elementary students

div.p: PreK-12 students who call the MSD home
middle schoolers enrolled in the arts
directed to our schools by the Morris Ed Foundation
and only district in the League of Innovative Schools in Morris County
STEM Academy partnerships with local professional organizations
K-5 schools with outdoor classrooms or learning labs
technology program for students in grades 6-12
elementary teachers trained in social-emotional learning

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: The Morris School District is closed under further notice. Students, staff, and families can now access the Virtual Learning Hub.
Please visit our Coronavirus Update Center, which will be updated with the latest information and resources for the district community.
